thread.title: Travelling Bible exhibit comes to Philadelphia Convention Center as part of Pope Francis' visit
thread.title_full: Travelling Bible exhibit comes to Philadelphia Convention Center as part of Pope Francis' visit - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Travelling Bible exhibit comes to Philadelphia Convention Center as part of Pope Francis' visit
text:
PHILADELPHIA - A travelling Bible exhibit is opening at the Philadelphia Convention Center in conjunction with Pope Francis' visit later this week for the World Meeting of Families Conference.
The exhibit from the Museum of the Bible's Green Collection is called Verbum Domini II: God's Word Goes Out to the Nations.
The exhibit includes 80 rare texts, including Papyri from the third and fourth centuries.
The display is open from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Monday through Friday and 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on Saturday.
